TheGame

Class Discardpile

  • java.lang.Object
    • TheGame.CardHolder
      • TheGame.Discardpile

  • public class Discardpile
extends CardHolder
    The discardpile consists of nothing for now, I already once refactored it away once, but then decided that it might be of some use when figuring out what to show in the graphics part of the game (ie. might be usefull later).
